message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $12000 to us, but considering its value to you, we're willing to start negotiations at $9500. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to propose a counteroffer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.
